title: Fake profiles, Fraud and Phishing
learning_objectives: Learn to analyze email messages to determine legitimacy
Get yourself familiar with common frauds
Learn to detect fake profiles on social media
main_messages: Emails can easily be forged; learn how to detect fake emails
Don’t trust offers that seem too good to be true
Fake profiles are usually easy to detect
questions: How would they analyze an email to see where it was really sent from?
What are the main characteristics of typical frauds?
How could they determine that the social media profile contacting them is fake?

practical_examples.text: 5 Ways to Detect a Phishing Email: With Examples

How to Detect Fake Profiles – Understanding Phishing
